name: Allan Douglas Jepson
content: Allan Jepson, Professor Emeritus See my Google Scholar Page for a list of publications, co-authors and citations. I have retired and am not taking new students. Brief Biography Allan Jepson received his B.Sc. in 1976 from the University of British Columbia and his Ph.D. in Applied Mathematics in 1980 from the California Institute of Technology. He then moved to a postdoctoral position in the Mathematics Department at Stanford University. In 1982 he joined the faculty at the Department of Computer Science at the University of Toronto. He became a full professor in 1991, and retired as a Professor Emeritus in 2019. For More Information For more detailed information, see my Curriculum Vitae (resume).
